Package ru.nubowski.timeTracker.controller

Class TimeLogController

java.lang.Object
ru.nubowski.timeTracker.controller.TimeLogController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/time_logs") public class TimeLogController extends Object
Controller for handling time log related endpoints.

  • Method Details

    • getAllTimeLogs

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TimeLog>> getAllTimeLogs()
      Returns all time logs.
      Returns:
      a list of all time logs.

    • getTimeLogsByTask

      @GetMapping("/task/{taskId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TimeLogsByTaskResponse>> getTimeLogsByTask(@PathVariable Long taskId)
      Returns the time logs associated with the given task id.
      Parameters:
      taskId - the id of the task whose time logs are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of time logs associated with the given task id.

    • getTimeLog

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TimeLogByIdResponse> getTimeLog(@PathVariable Long id)
      Returns the time log with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the time log to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the time log with the given id.

    • createTimeLog

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TimeLog> createTimeLog(@RequestBody TimeLog timeLog)
      Creates a new time log.
      Parameters:
      timeLog - the details of the time log to be created.
      Returns:
      the created time log.

    • deleteTimeLog

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteTimeLog(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes the time log with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the time log to be deleted.
      Returns:
      a response entity with HTTP status 204.
